message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm trying to stay within a budget, and that's the highest I can go. Can we meet in the middle at $82.50?
